Damn, you're in my way!\""},{"lineNumber":68936,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピサロは小うるさい幻獣を無視し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Pizarro ignored the pesky phantom beasts,"},{"lineNumber":68937,"originalJapaneseLine":"前傾姿勢になった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and leaned forward in an offensive stance."},{"lineNumber":68938,"originalJapaneseLine":"「雷撃！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thunder Strike!\""},{"lineNumber":68939,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ッ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch...!\""},{"lineNumber":68940,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランの魔法が、ピサロの顔面に弾ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ran's magic burst against Pizarro's face."},{"lineNumber":68941,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、さほどの衝撃はない。","translatedEnglishLine":"But it wasn’t much of an impact."},{"lineNumber":68942,"originalJapaneseLine":"（あいつはどうでもいいか。","translatedEnglishLine":"(That guy's not worth bothering about."},{"lineNumber":68943,"originalJapaneseLine":"剣も魔法も大した事はない……）","translatedEnglishLine":"Neither his sword nor magic is anything special...)"} okay, coming right up!\""},{"lineNumber":68946,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬッ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nu...!\""},{"lineNumber":68947,"originalJapaneseLine":"再び、視界が真っ白になる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Once again, his vision went completely white."},{"lineNumber":68948,"originalJapaneseLine":"同時にランが走り出すのが見えたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"At the same time, he saw Ran start running,"},{"lineNumber":68949,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピサロは意に介さなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"but Pizarro paid it no mind."},{"lineNumber":68950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まとめて、薙ぎ払ってくれるわ――――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll sweep them all away at once――――\""},{"lineNumber":68951,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピサロは魔法や砲撃に防御姿勢を取りつつ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Pizarro took a defensive stance against magic and cannon fire,"},{"lineNumber":68952,"originalJapaneseLine":"指先を前方の空間に向ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"and pointed his fingertips into the space ahead."},{"lineNumber":68953,"originalJapaneseLine":"狭い路地裏いっぱいに、","translatedEnglishLine":"In the narrow back alley,"},{"lineNumber":68954,"originalJapaneseLine":"かわるがわる突撃してくる幻獣に押されるが、","translatedEnglishLine":"he was being pushed by phantom beasts charging one after another,"},{"lineNumber":68955,"originalJapaneseLine":"逆にそれは、ピサロもその後ろに手が届くという事。","translatedEnglishLine":"which also meant Pizarro could reach behind them."},{"lineNumber":68956,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピサロの爪は、弾丸のように射出する機能があった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Pizarro's claws could be fired like bullets."},{"lineNumber":68957,"originalJapaneseLine":"破壊力は、魔法使いの小娘を殺すには十二分。","translatedEnglishLine":"The destructive power was more than enough to kill a young sorceress."},{"lineNumber":68958,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――この、小娘どもがッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—You little girls!\""},{"lineNumber":68959,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピサロの指先から、爪が撃ち出された。","translatedEnglishLine":"Claws shot out from Pizarro's fingertips."},{"lineNumber":68960,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは幻獣をすり抜け、そして……","translatedEnglishLine":"They passed through the phantom beasts and then..."},{"lineNumber":68961,"originalJapaneseLine":"虚ろな表情で立ち上がった、","translatedEnglishLine":"pierced Pizarro’s subordinates who had stood up with vacant expressions."},{"lineNumber":68962,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピサロの部下達に突き刺さったのが、","translatedEnglishLine":"They pierced Pizarro’s subordinates,"},{"lineNumber":68963,"originalJapaneseLine":"晴れた霧の向こうに見えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"visible through the clearing mist."},{"lineNumber":68964,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、な、何をしているんだ、貴様らァァァァ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-Wh-What are you doing, you bastards!?\""},{"lineNumber":68965,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………行きなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Go.\""},{"lineNumber":68966,"originalJapaneseLine":"「く、くくく、くたばれええええ！　人間！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-Dieeee! Humans!\""},{"lineNumber":68967,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、これで一発逆転だァァァァァ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-This is the comeback shot!\""},{"lineNumber":68968,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha...!\""},{"lineNumber":68969,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、手にした斧でピサロに襲いかかる。","translatedEnglishLine":"And they attacked Pizarro with the axe in hand."},{"lineNumber":68970,"originalJapaneseLine":"幻獣達に押され続け、ピサロは逃げられない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Pushed continually by the phantom beasts, Pizarro could not escape."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロは力任せに周囲ごと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pizarro forcibly tore off the sticky ground around him and stood up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 粘着した地面を引きはがして立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pizarro forcibly tore off the sticky ground around him and stood up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺が奪った物は俺の物だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What I took is mine!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰にも渡してたまるものか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won’t let anyone else have it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、はぁっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, haa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま一気に突進し、志津香に肉薄しかけたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He charged straight forward and almost closed the distance to Shizuka,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割って入ったランがかぎ爪を辛くも受け流す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Ran cut in and barely deflected his claws.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レッツ幻獣相撲！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's do Phantom Beast Sumo!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミルの周囲から無数の幻獣が溢れ出し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Countless phantom beasts poured out from around Miru,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロに襲いかかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and attacked Pizarro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、なんだ、この……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, what is this...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 個々の突進などピサロには微々たる衝撃だが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each individual charge was only a slight impact to Pizarro,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが積み重なり、押しのけようにも触れられない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but they accumulated, and even trying to push them away, he couldn't reach them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果として、ピサロは対面の壁まで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result, Pizarro was helplessly pushed back to the opposite wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしようもなく押し込まれていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was driven back with no way to resist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「三式弾、いっけぇーーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Type 3 shell, fireーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ファイヤーレーザーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fire laserーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がぁっ、はぁ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gah, haa...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幻獣には当たらないのを逆用し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Taking advantage that the phantom beasts weren't hit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その背後からチューリップ1号の特殊弾頭と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from behind them, the special warhead of Tulip No.1,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 四本の熱閃がピサロに突き刺さる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and four blazing flashes pierced Pizarro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （――あの帽子のガキ、なんという魔力だ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (That hat kid, what kind of magical power is that...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにあの砲弾、例の戦車の武器か……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And that shell, is that the weapon from that tank...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐ、ぅっ……！　ええい、邪魔だッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh, ugh...! Damn, you're in my way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロは小うるさい幻獣を無視し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pizarro ignored the pesky phantom beasts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前傾姿勢になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and leaned forward in an offensive stance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「雷撃！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thunder Strike!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランの魔法が、ピサロの顔面に弾ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ran's magic burst against Pizarro's face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、さほどの衝撃はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it wasn’t much of an impact.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （あいつはどうでもいいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (That guy's not worth bothering about.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣も魔法も大した事はない……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Neither his sword nor magic is anything special...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マリア、煙幕！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maria, smoke screen!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい、っと！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Okay, okay, coming right up!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再び、視界が真っ白になる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once again, his vision went completely white.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同時にランが走り出すのが見えたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the same time, he saw Ran start running,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロは意に介さなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Pizarro paid it no mind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まとめて、薙ぎ払ってくれるわ――――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll sweep them all away at once――――"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロは魔法や砲撃に防御姿勢を取りつつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pizarro took a defensive stance against magic and cannon fire,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指先を前方の空間に向ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and pointed his fingertips into the space ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 狭い路地裏いっぱいに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the narrow back alley,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かわるがわる突撃してくる幻獣に押されるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was being pushed by phantom beasts charging one after another,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逆にそれは、ピサロもその後ろに手が届くという事。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which also meant Pizarro could reach behind them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロの爪は、弾丸のように射出する機能があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pizarro's claws could be fired like bullets.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破壊力は、魔法使いの小娘を殺すには十二分。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The destructive power was more than enough to kill a young sorceress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――この、小娘どもがッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—You little girls!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロの指先から、爪が撃ち出された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Claws shot out from Pizarro's fingertips.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは幻獣をすり抜け、そして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They passed through the phantom beasts and then...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 虚ろな表情で立ち上がった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pierced Pizarro’s subordinates who had stood up with vacant expressions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロの部下達に突き刺さったのが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They pierced Pizarro’s subordinates,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 晴れた霧の向こうに見えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: visible through the clearing mist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、な、何をしているんだ、貴様らァァァァ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Wh-What are you doing, you bastards!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………行きなさい」
「く、くくく、くたばれええええ！　人間！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-Dieeee! Humans!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、これで一発逆転だァァァァァ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-This is the comeback shot!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、手にした斧でピサロに襲いかかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And they attacked Pizarro with the axe in hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幻獣達に押され続け、ピサロは逃げられない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pushed continually by the phantom beasts, Pizarro could not escape.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

bastards!?\""},{"lineNumber":68965,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………行きなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Go.\""},{"lineNumber":68966,"originalJapaneseLine":"「く、くくく、くたばれええええ！　人間！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-Dieeee! Humans!\""},{"lineNumber":68967,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、これで一発逆転だァァァァァ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-This is the comeback shot!\""},{"lineNumber":68968,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha...!\""},{"lineNumber":68969,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、手にした斧でピサロに襲いかかる。","translatedEnglishLine":"And they attacked Pizarro with the axe in hand."},{"lineNumber":68970,"originalJapaneseLine":"幻獣達に押され続け、ピサロは逃げられない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Pushed continually by the phantom beasts, Pizarro could not escape."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロは力任せに周囲ごと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pizarro forcibly tore off the sticky ground around him and stood up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 粘着した地面を引きはがして立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pizarro forcibly tore off the sticky ground around him and stood up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺が奪った物は俺の物だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What I took is mine!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰にも渡してたまるものか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won’t let anyone else have it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、はぁっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, haa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま一気に突進し、志津香に肉薄しかけたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He charged straight forward and almost closed the distance to Shizuka,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割って入ったランがかぎ爪を辛くも受け流す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Ran cut in and barely deflected his claws.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レッツ幻獣相撲！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's do Phantom Beast Sumo!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミルの周囲から無数の幻獣が溢れ出し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Countless phantom beasts poured out from around Miru,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロに襲いかかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and attacked Pizarro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、なんだ、この……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, what is this...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 個々の突進などピサロには微々たる衝撃だが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each individual charge was only a slight impact to Pizarro,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが積み重なり、押しのけようにも触れられない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but they accumulated, and even trying to push them away, he couldn't reach them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果として、ピサロは対面の壁まで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result, Pizarro was helplessly pushed back to the opposite wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしようもなく押し込まれていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was driven back with no way to resist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「三式弾、いっけぇーーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Type 3 shell, fireーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ファイヤーレーザーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fire laserーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がぁっ、はぁ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gah, haa...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幻獣には当たらないのを逆用し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Taking advantage that the phantom beasts weren't hit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その背後からチューリップ1号の特殊弾頭と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from behind them, the special warhead of Tulip No.1,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 四本の熱閃がピサロに突き刺さる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and four blazing flashes pierced Pizarro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （――あの帽子のガキ、なんという魔力だ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (That hat kid, what kind of magical power is that...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにあの砲弾、例の戦車の武器か……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And that shell, is that the weapon from that tank...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐ、ぅっ……！　ええい、邪魔だッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh, ugh...! Damn, you're in my way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロは小うるさい幻獣を無視し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pizarro ignored the pesky phantom beasts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前傾姿勢になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and leaned forward in an offensive stance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「雷撃！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thunder Strike!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランの魔法が、ピサロの顔面に弾ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ran's magic burst against Pizarro's face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、さほどの衝撃はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it wasn’t much of an impact.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （あいつはどうでもいいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (That guy's not worth bothering about.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣も魔法も大した事はない……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Neither his sword nor magic is anything special...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マリア、煙幕！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maria, smoke screen!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい、っと！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Okay, okay, coming right up!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再び、視界が真っ白になる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once again, his vision went completely white.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同時にランが走り出すのが見えたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the same time, he saw Ran start running,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロは意に介さなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Pizarro paid it no mind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まとめて、薙ぎ払ってくれるわ――――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll sweep them all away at once――――"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロは魔法や砲撃に防御姿勢を取りつつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pizarro took a defensive stance against magic and cannon fire,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指先を前方の空間に向ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and pointed his fingertips into the space ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 狭い路地裏いっぱいに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the narrow back alley,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かわるがわる突撃してくる幻獣に押されるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was being pushed by phantom beasts charging one after another,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逆にそれは、ピサロもその後ろに手が届くという事。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which also meant Pizarro could reach behind them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロの爪は、弾丸のように射出する機能があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pizarro's claws could be fired like bullets.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破壊力は、魔法使いの小娘を殺すには十二分。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The destructive power was more than enough to kill a young sorceress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――この、小娘どもがッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—You little girls!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロの指先から、爪が撃ち出された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Claws shot out from Pizarro's fingertips.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは幻獣をすり抜け、そして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They passed through the phantom beasts and then...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 虚ろな表情で立ち上がった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pierced Pizarro’s subordinates who had stood up with vacant expressions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロの部下達に突き刺さったのが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They pierced Pizarro’s subordinates,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 晴れた霧の向こうに見えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: visible through the clearing mist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、な、何をしているんだ、貴様らァァァァ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Wh-What are you doing, you bastards!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………行きなさい」
「く、くくく、くたばれええええ！　人間！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-Dieeee! Humans!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、これで一発逆転だァァァァァ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-This is the comeback shot!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、手にした斧でピサロに襲いかかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And they attacked Pizarro with the axe in hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幻獣達に押され続け、ピサロは逃げられない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pushed continually by the phantom beasts, Pizarro could not escape.
